name: BASE Rett Syndrome Research Trust Cure 360 NFT Edition

metadata.name: BASE Rett Syndrome Research Trust Cure 360 NFT Edition 1/10000
metadata.description:
As a father of a girl with rett syndrome, i would do everything, to help to find a cure for my daughter and all affected rett girls, all over the world.

This is the first "Cure 360 NFT" edition with a big shout out:

"A cure for rett syndrome, is possible" into the crypto space.

All money, to 100% which I will receive through the sales, i will donate proven to Rett Syndrome Research Trust.

More informations to RSRT here:

https://reverserett.org/research/

https://reverserett.org/news/articles/neurogene-advances-a-rett-gene-replacement-program-1/

This i a private campaign and not connected, to any other project from my own side, as a father, to try to be the first one on that way, to collect donations and support the clinical trials, to find a cure for rett syndrome.

Thanks everybody in advance, to be a part of that !!!

properties.name: BASE Rett Syndrome Research Trust Cure 360 NFT Edition
